name: font-sniper
title: Font Sniper
description:
Identify and download fonts from any website.

Disclaimer: FontSniper detects loaded browser fonts for testing/research only. Read more in README
author: riomadeit

commands.description: Identify and download fonts from any website.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
